title: rustdoc fails at resolving intra doc links

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust ``` ```bash git clone --branch overseer-janitor https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot git checkout 228286b7fc30bfc8e5531bf2da8a91ce4dadc209 # I could not find a way to minimize this yet beyond this crate cargo doc -p polkadot-node-subsystem ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.60.0 (7737e0b5c 2022-04-04) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7737e0b5c4103216d6fd8cf941b7ab9bdbaace7c commit-date: 2022-04-04 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0 LLVM version: 14.0.0 **** ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', src/librustdoc/passes/collect_intra_doc_links.rs:916:16 ```
Backtrace

``` Documenting polkadot-overseer v0.9.19 (/media/supersonic1t/projects/parity/polkadot-bernhard-clunky-janitor/node/overseer) Wrote dot graph to /media/supersonic1t/projects/parity/polkadot-bernhard-clunky-janitor/target/debug/build/polkadot-overseer-gen-proc-macro-59aceb927e03c652/out/overseer-subsystem-messaging.dot expander: writing /media/supersonic1t/projects/parity/polkadot-bernhard-clunky-janitor/target/debug/build/expander-892520bfcbca1cc2/out/overlord-expansion-9e3f81136d16.rs Documenting polkadot-node-subsystem v0.9.19 (/media/supersonic1t/projects/parity/polkadot-bernhard-clunky-janitor/node/subsystem) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', src/librustdoc/passes/collect_intra_doc_links.rs:916:16 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f6e4fdc086d -
